text.__SUMMARY__:
Tillandsia geminiflora is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Brazil, Suriname, Paraguay, Uruguay, and the Misiones Province of Argentina.Two varieties are recognized:
Tillandsia geminiflora var. geminiflora - most of species range
Tillandsia geminiflora var. incana (Wawra) Mez  - Uruguay and southeastern Brazil
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Bushfire'
Tillandsia 'J. R.'
Tillandsia 'Mystic Twins'
Tillandsia 'Pink Sugar'
Tillandsia 'Pink Surprise'
